/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a corridor of urban life. A white truck and a red truck are parked on the side of the road, adding a splash of color to the scene. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft light over the cityscape. The image is slightly distorted due to the fisheye lens used, adding a unique perspective to the photograph.
